results.name: a(n) = n^2*binomial(2*n-2, n-1).
reference: The right-hand side of a binomial coefficient identity in H. W. Gould, Combinatorial Identities, Morgantown, 1972.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Nikita Gogin and Mika Hirvensalo, On the Moments of Squared Binomial Coefficients, (2020).
formula: a(n) = n^2*A000984(n-1). - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jan 18 2007, corrected Jul 26 2015
a(n) = n*A037965(n). - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jan 18 2007, corrected Jul 26 2015
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
